product_info.title: ZQ600 Plus Series Mobile Printers
product_info.tagline: Premium mobile label and receipt printers for maximum productivity
product_info.description: The ZQ600 Plus Series takes Zebra’s popular QLn platform and makes it even better—adding advanced technology and innovative design that drive productivity, ease of use, and manageability to new levels. With Wi-Fi 6, advanced battery technology, instant wake-up, and Zebra's Print DNA software suite, the ZQ600 Plus Series delivers best-in-class performance for enterprise mobility printing across retail, manufacturing, and logistics.

printer.maximum_print_speed: Up to 4.5 in./115 mm per second
printer.media_sensors: Black mark and gap media sensing using fixed center position sensors; label present sensor for issuing batch labels one at a time

zq610_plus.imperial: 6.73 in. L x 3.6 in. W x 2.85 in. H
zq610_plus.metric: 170.9 mm L x 91.4 mm W x 72.4 mm H

zq620_plus.imperial: 6.84 in. L x 4.64 in. W x 3.03 in. H
zq620_plus.metric: 173.7 mm L x 117.9 mm W x 76.9 mm H

zq630_plus.imperial: 7.35 in. L x 6.5 in. W x 3.25 in. H
zq630_plus.metric: 186.7 mm L x 165.1 mm W x 82.5 mm H

media.label_and_liner_length: 0.5 in./12.7 mm to 32 in./813 mm or continuous

media_width.zq630_plus: 2.0 in./51 mm to 4.4 in./112 mm (linered); 2.0 in./51 mm to 4.1 in./104 mm (linerless)

maximum_roll_size.zq610_plus: 2.2 in./55.9 mm OD on a 0.75 in./19 mm or 1.375 in./34.9 mm inner core
maximum_roll_size.zq620_plus: 2.6 in./66 mm OD on a 0.75 in./19 mm or 1.375 in./34.9 mm inner core
maximum_roll_size.zq630_plus: 2.6 in./66 mm OD on a 0.75 in./19 mm or 1.375 in./34.9 mm inner core

media.thickness: 2.3 mil to 5.5 mil tag stock or 6.5 mil label stock

power.zq610_plus_and_zq620_plus: 3250 mAh (nominal) 23.4 Wh removable, rechargeable PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion battery
power.zq630_plus: 6600 mAh (nominal) 47.5 Wh removable PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion battery

standard: Apple iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile connectivity
Direct thermal printing of barcodes, text and graphics
CPCL, EPL and ZPL programming languages
Black mark and gap media sensing
Zebra Print Touch with NFC pairing
IP54 dust and water resistance rating
Drop tolerance up to 6 ft./1.83 m (ZQ630 Plus)
Power Smart Print Technology™ for optimized battery usage
optional: Extended Capacity PowerPrecision+ Battery (ZQ610 Plus and ZQ620 Plus only)

fonts_and_barcodes.standard_fonts: 25 bitmapped, 1 smooth, scalable (CG Triumvirate Bold Condensed, contains UFST™ from Agfa Monotype Corporation)

features: 802.1x EAP support (EAP-FAST, EAP-TTLS, EAP-TLS, PEAP, LEAP)

connectivity.connector: Mini-B connector with optional strain relief

compliance.security: FIPS support available at no cost as printer OS download

warranty.coverage: Warranted against defects in workmanship and materials for 1 year from date of shipment. Batteries and printheads are considered consumables.

additional_information.zebra_dna: Built-in Print DNA software suite with management, security, and optimization tools.
additional_information.zebraonecare: Maintenance and protection plans offering certified repairs, support, and visibility services.
additional_information.printer_profile_manager: Remote management solution providing real-time visibility and configuration for Link-OS printers.

services.visibility_services: Real-time operational insights into printer performance.
services.technical_support: 24/7 Zebra technical support available under Zebra OneCare.
services.repair_services: Comprehensive repair coverage including accidental damage.
